title: Set a Goal to Hit Silver From Bronze 4 COMPLETED IT!
body:
Trust me i'm Not the best player, I know how to play decent. I have an Issue with playing from behind, But this season I found my groove and Made it out of bronze because i set a Rank goal for myself. Next Season i will be aiming for GOLD! Just wanted to share my success this Season{{champion:103}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:498}}

Thanks for all the Kind words, Gold is My goal for the first split! ANd good luck with all your GOals too
